name: Traffrix
description:
2 Players - Xbox Controllers

As a Human you must escape the "Representatives", or reps, who are chasing you because you found the LockForger which can help you escape the Traffrix.

As a Representative you must exterminate the Human by reaching their location, thus stopping their escape. Run, jump, and control cars to get as close to the human scum as you can. 

the LockForger will unlock the firewall after five minutes allowing the humans to escape and win. 

Attributes:

Sound Effects: 

Street - Recorded by Daniel Simion

My Bongos - thatjeffcarter - freesound

Unity - Standard Assets

Music
